thread.title: Easy ways to save space in your apartment
thread.title_full: Easy ways to save space in your apartment - Business Insider

author: Jacob Shamsian
title: Easy ways to save space in your apartment
text:
A small apartment doesn't have to feel small with these tricks. Nick Adams/Reuters
The INSIDER Summary:
• Everyone should try to save space in their apartment.
• These 15 tips range from making the place look bigger to actually creating more space.
• Things will look better and you can move around more easily.
Whether you're living in a city with high rent prices, or simply want to get the most bang for your buck when it comes to where you live, everyone wants to try to save space.
For small apartments in particular, there are a few smart tricks you can try. Magnetic storage containers turn regular walls into movable shelves. And all that space under your bed can hold a ton of spare clothing.
Keep the clutter to a minimum and maximize your decorating with these 15 tips.
Diana Yukari/Business Insider
